scripts.pkg-linux: mkdir -p bin/pkg && npm run pkg && cd bin/pkg && zip vvsh.linux.exe.zip vvsh.linux.exe && cd -
scripts.pkg-mac: mkdir -p bin/pkg && npm run pkg && cd bin/pkg && zip vvsh.linux.exe.zip vvsh.linux.exe && cd -
scripts.nexe-mac: mkdir -p bin/nexe && nexe bin/vvsh.js -r dist/main.js -t macos -o bin/nexe/vvsh.mac.exe && cd bin/nexe && zip vvsh.mac.exe.zip vvsh.mac.exe && cd -
scripts.nexe-linux: mkdir -p bin/nexe && nexe bin/vvsh.js -r dist/main.js -t linux -o bin/nexe/vvsh.linux.exe && cd bin/nexe && zip vvsh.linux.exe.zip vvsh.linux.exe && cd -
scripts.nexe-win: mkdir -p bin/nexe && nexe bin/vvsh.js -r dist/main.js -t win -o bin/nexe/vvsh.win.exe && cd bin/nexe && zip vvsh.win.exe.zip vvsh.win.exe && cd -
scripts.nexe-all: npm run tsc && rm -rf bin/nexe && npm run nexe-mac && npm run nexe-linux && npm run nexe-win;
scripts.pubpub: npm run tsc && npm publish --access public
